title: Monsters & Mist
description: The Girl with Warrior Aspirations.The Playboy Prince. The Ruthless Queen.One will seek to enslave the world. One will lead the rebellion. And one will be the catalyst.The Warrior General with a tragic past.The Disgraced Bounty Hunter. The Girl with the Constellation on Her Face.One will rise to the challenge. One will return what was once lost. And one will embrace their destiny. Six lives. One world borne anew.
author: Taylor Fenner
